title: Contentful - Activity Overview
description: This Dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the content and action events captured by the Contentful platform.

definition.content:
## Overview

- This Dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the content and action events captured by the Contentful platform.

## Widgets
1. Total Events
2. Frequent Events
3. Infrequent Events
4. Event List
5. Entries Published
6. Entries Unpublished
7. Entries Archived
8. Entries Unarchived
9. Entries Published by Content Type
10. Entry Activity Distribution
11. Entry Event List
12. Assets Published
13. Assets Unpublished
14. Assets Archived
15. Assets Unarchived
16. Asset Activity Distribution
17. Asset Event List
18. Content Types Published
19. Content Types Unpublished
20. Content Type Activity Distribution
21. Content Type Event List
22. Task Activity Distribution
23. Task Event List
24. Comment Activity Distribution
25. Comment Event List
26. Scheduled Actions Created
27. Scheduled Actions Deleted
28. Scheduled Action Status Distribution
29. Failed Scheduled Action Details
30. Scheduled Action Event List
31. Bulk Action Status Distribution
32. Failed Bulk Action Details
33. Bulk Action Event List
